Class AnimalMonitor

java.lang.Object
AnimalMonitor
public class AnimalMonitor extends Object
Monitor counts of different types of animal. Sightings are recorded by spotters.
Version:
7.3
Author:
David J. Barnes and Michael KÃ¶lling

      Print a list of the types of animal considered to be endangered.
      Parameters:
      animalNames - A list of animals names.
      dangerThreshold - Counts less-than or equal-to to this level are considered to be dangerous.

    • countSightingsInArea

      public int countSightingsInArea(String animal, Location topLeft, Location bottomRight)
      Count the number of sightings of the given animal within a given area.
      Parameters:
      animal - The animal to find.
      topLeft - The top-left of a rectangular area.
      bottomRight - The bottom-right of a rectangular area.
      Returns:
      The total number of matching sightings.
